forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
This late afternoon in Downtown San Francisco embraces a gentle warmth wrapped in a soft, sunny glow. With the temperature hovering around a comfortable 64 degrees, the bright blue sky beckons those weary of indoor confinement to venture outside. The crisp west-southwest wind adds a refreshing touch, swirling around 14 mph, occasionally gusting to 20 mph, offering a delightful contrast to the afternoon heat. While the sun casts its golden light, one can sense the lingering whispers of mist as the marine layer prepares to creep in later.

As evening draws near, expect a shift in the atmosphere, with a patchy drizzle anticipated post 2 a.m., cloaking the city in a veil of clouds—an embrace of moisture that brings dreams of comfort and introspection. The forecast hints at a low of 56, inviting layers for warmth as the air turns cool and damp. A leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero would be a rewarding option today, where the sound of waves mingles with the soft clinking of glasses from nearby cafes. Perhaps seek refuge in a cozy bookstore or sip on a warming cup of tea as the city's heartbeat slows, preparing for the night ahead.
